title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\AdvancedMachineFeatures
name: AdvancedMachineFeatures
description:
Specifies options for controlling advanced machine features.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.AdvancedMachineFeatures

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.threads_per_core
params.description: The number of threads per physical core. To disable simultaneous multithreading (SMT) set this to 1. If unset, the maximum number of threads supported per core by the underlying processor is assumed.

methods.name: getThreadsPerCore
methods.description:
